title: Raven - P2P Logistics
summary: Revolutionizing international package delivery by connecting travelers with senders. Save up to 80% on shipping costs.
description: A peer-to-peer platform revolutionizing international package delivery by connecting travelers with senders.
bullets: Architected backend using NestJS and TypeScript with a focus on scalability and real-time operations.
Integrated Stream API for secure real-time chat and Azure AD B2C for authentication.
Developed the cross-platform mobile frontend using React Native with Expo and Tamagui for a performant and fast user experience.
content:
Raven started from a simple observation: international shipping is expensive, yet millions of travelers fly with empty luggage space every day. What if we could connect these travelers with people who need to send packages abroad?

The platform enables senders to post their packages with pickup and delivery locations, while travelers can browse and accept deliveries along their route. Everyone wins - senders save up to 80% on shipping, travelers earn extra income, and we reduce carbon emissions.

## Technical Architecture

The backend is built with NestJS and TypeScript, deployed on Azure with automatic scaling. Real-time chat between senders and travelers uses Stream API, ensuring secure and reliable communication.

Authentication is handled through Azure AD B2C, supporting social logins and enterprise SSO for our B2B customers.

The mobile app is built with React Native and Expo, using Tamagui for a consistent design system across iOS and Android.

title: Lady Justice AI
summary: AI-powered legal platform processing documents for enhanced accessibility. Built for Finland's Justice 4.0 initiative.
description: An AI-powered legal platform that processes and analyzes legal documents for enhanced accessibility.
bullets: Built data pipelines using Azure ML SDK for ingestion and preparation of structured and unstructured legal datasets.
Developed full-stack modules (React, Node.js, Python) that powered key AI-driven platform functionality.
Contributed to dataset structuring used for the platform's LLM training.
content:
Lady Justice AI is part of Finland's ambitious Justice 4.0 initiative to modernize the legal system using artificial intelligence.

The platform processes legal documents - court decisions, legislation, and legal precedents - making them searchable and accessible to legal professionals and citizens alike.

## My Contribution

I was responsible for building the data pipelines that ingest and prepare both structured and unstructured legal datasets. Using Azure ML SDK, I created workflows that extract, transform, and load millions of documents into our training corpus.

On the frontend, I developed React modules that allow users to interact with the AI, ask questions about legal matters, and receive contextual answers backed by relevant case law.

title: €5M Automation Infrastructure
summary: Enterprise automation systems generating €5M in annual savings. Led CI/CD pipeline design reducing deployment time by 70%.
description: Led the development of automation systems that generated €5M in annual savings for enterprise clients.
bullets: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%.
Built monitoring dashboards for real-time performance tracking.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams across Madrid and Brussels offices.
content:
During my internship at Hogarth Worldwide in Madrid, I had the opportunity to work on enterprise-scale automation infrastructure that directly impacted the company's bottom line.

## The Challenge

Hogarth handles content production for major global brands. The manual processes for asset management, quality assurance, and deployment were time-consuming and error-prone.

## The Solution

I designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform on AWS. These pipelines automated the entire content production workflow - from asset ingestion to quality checks to multi-platform deployment.

## Impact

- 70% reduction in deployment time
- €5M in annual savings from automation
- Real-time monitoring dashboards for performance tracking
- Seamless collaboration between Madrid and Brussels teams
